::: {.hero}
Stay up to date with the latest training opportunities, conferences, and developments across our community.

This page highlights upcoming workshops and key announcements designed to support professional growth, collaboration, and innovation in the research world. 
:::


```{ojs}
//| eval: true
news_data = FileAttachment("assets/news.csv").csv({typed: true})
```

```{ojs}
// Display the news blocks loaded from news_data.
html`
<div id="news" class="list-grid">
  ${news_data.map(row => html`
    <div class="card ${row.category}">
      ${row.image ? html`<img src="${row.image}" style="width:100%">` : ""}
      <div class="card-body">
        <h3><a href="${row.link}">${row.title }</a></h3>
        ${md`${row.description}`}
      </div>
    </div>
  `)}
</div>
`
```
